suruw nya ga waya mu ba’un, aring la’i cikuy lga tkba ke Nipun, nerin nya ga Truku, maki beh ptyawan nya ga piyux ba’un nya c’oli Tewan, nanu yaca ku piyux ke ba’un nya kmayan.

knita na uya mu ga hmet ci la, kyalun nya tbayi maha hmway cikah.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

ana ga kmayan tbayi haca maha waya hmway ci la, iyat mu hetun pila la.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

kmayan tbayi cyu maki syaw haca maha, uwah bayi ’cyux mu, hopa ru hmway ci ’cyux mu.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。

puting ci ga waya myan bayi welung ru ’cyux, tehok sali lga utux hanray ni’an rrami waya myan puyun.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

bsya ci mnaga cami, memaw mku’ung kayan la.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們等了好久，天都已經黑了。

mwah rengwa sswe likuy maha, nyu siy tbah ini hngaw hetay la, babaw ’nyan hngawan ryax ga yaca thoyay cu mwah sali.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn’t take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

kmayan uya mu maha piyux ci tnahok ta rrami la, sgiy kwara c’oli uwah s’un mani.
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let’s eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多菜，叫大家一起來吃吧!

tpihun myan glu ru llpyung, uwah ms’un mani piyux ci nni’un na kgabi hani.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

kyan utux gluw m’was biru mu ga Hayung, heya ga ryax ryax mungi maras y’aya nya.
I have a classmate named Hayung, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Hayung，他常常忘記帶東西。

tkba biru cami ga, ksiyu kryax gluw m’was biru bbrwan, ccong ini ga bbiru lban.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他常跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

te utux, te sa’ing, te tugan ga, syugan naha heya kwara.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

ana ga kyan utux ya’eh scu nya, ksiyu y’aya naha lga ini nya wahiy matu kryax.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

suruw nya lga ini naha ksyugiy y’aya naha la.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

kyan utux ryax, mlu cami mosa mtisan kwara myan.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

maki tu’i ga, smoya mosa stanux Hayung haca, ana ga waya mungi maras lban ccong nya.
On the way, Hayung wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Hayung想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

heya ga aki cyu smoya ksiyu lban ccong gluw m’was biru, ana ga kmayan kwara naha maha, ini cami aras uyi.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他想跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我們也沒有帶耶。

memaw sktan ci ru ngilis Hayung haca. ms’ang kmayan heya maha, ca cu nya ini ksyugiy lban ccong kwara naha!
Hayung burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Hayung急的哭了出來。他生氣的說，為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!!

gluw m’was biru ga kyalun nya heya maha, baha mcwa ini su aras nanak, ini ga ksiyu su y’aya naha lga, ini su wahiy matu la.
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

kcuxan nya ga mwah m’was biru, mgebu ci mwah pwasan briu Hayung haca, kwara knsyugan nya y’aya ga waya nya halan matu gluw m’was biru kwara.
The next day at school, Hayung arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Hayung很早就到學校了，Hayung把全部所借的東西都還給同學們。

mkura gluw m’was biru tmatuk tunux Hayung haca, kmayan maha babaw nya ga p’aras cu nanak y’aya mu, shway nya kwara gluw m’was biru waya smwa’ing ksiyu heya kwara y’aya naha lela.
Hayung apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Hayung向同學們道歉，並說以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

yaba mu ga mlikuy mluyak alang myan.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

la’i cikuy cu ga, yaba ru mama mu mhtu tanux gbyan kryax, maras lalaw ru patus.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔常在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

cmyax kayan sasan lga, panga ksinu bnu naha mwah sali.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 早上天亮時，他們會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

kruma ga biyak kahung, kruma ga yapit, kruma uyi ga p’oreh.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

naha ga maki pkiyuk alang lga ksyugun naha kwara ksinu, halan naha m’asu c’oli.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

mkebu caku yaba mu kryax, smoya cu mlu yaba mu mosa mluyak.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

kmayan yaba mu maha naga hopa kawas mu lga rasun cu nya mosa mlu.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

mlikuy alang myan ga kba cmi t’oya kmiyak ksinu uyi, naha haca ga kba cmi tlnga ru rangay.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

yaba mu ga kba ci kle tlnga, kmayan yaba mu maha, kwani ga pkiyak ta p’oreh, le’un ta mita rapan na ksinu, t’oya ga pcyan ta babaw tu’i nwahan na ksinu.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

smoya cu aki helaw hayi mlu kwara bkis mosa mluyak, tkba cu cmi t’oya kryax, t’oya mu ga helaw ci waya ciri calay ksinu.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我常常練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱真的抓到獵物。

texan cu nya yaba mu lga kyalun cu nya maha, babaw nya ga mosa su kba calay mluyak.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說，以後我一定很會打獵。

hopa kawas mu micu la, panga cu bhoni ru pnelu maku, mlu cu yaba mu mosa mluyak.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

mwah cami alang myan lga ksyugun myan pnanga ksinu, syugun myan kwara c’oli.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

kmayan yaba mu maha, shway ta nhway bne’an na lutux bnkesan, thoyay ta mluyak piyux ci ksinu.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

msu’i cu mosa m’was biru sasan la.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

mosa cu pwasan biru ga, yngyan mu maras kabang la.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

ini cu aras ana nanu.
I didn't bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

m’was biru ga, ms’un cu gluw m’was biru mita biru ppwasun.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

pcpung miru ga, syugan cu nya bbrwan ru ccong nku gluw m’was biru.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

kyalun cu nya psba biru maha, “babaw nya ga helaw hayi mtuli, iya ksu’i la!”
The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

myasa ci lpyung mu ga Yukan, heya ga la’i Tayan uyi.
My good friend’s name is Yukan, and he is also an Tayal child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Yukan，他也是泰雅族的小孩。

ms’un cami m’was biru beh alang Pyahaw.
We study together in the Pyahaw. tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在碧候部落讀書。

ms’un cami mung bkis kmayan yaw lela, kba cami calay kmayan ke Tayan.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Tayal proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說泰雅語。

bawi caku ci ru thuy caku ci, Yukan ga, creh ci ru mhekang ci.
I am tall and overweight, while Yukan is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Yukan很矮也很瘦。

Yukan ga shelaw calay, sli naha ci kwara.
Yukan is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Yukan很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

soni ga unrokay na pwasan biru, piyux ci pcpung nya waya crxun nku pwasan biru.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

kyan mholuy snyu, kmkah boru, mt’enah, myugi ru cmu pnelu.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

kinang ga pcpung cu mt’enah.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

trang t’enah caku ga, wa caku takuy la, piyux ci smuyux nya tari mu.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

ana ga mtuli caku, mkura cu gleng mt’enah loyi.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

tehok cu pcingan lga m’es kwara c’oli.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

ana cu ini agan te utux cnrxan ga, m’es caku calay, baha mcwa waya caku thoyay tmasu pcpung la.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

mnluw cu yaba mu mnwah mita mama mu hesa.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

wa m’ilis kakay mama mu la.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔的腳受傷了。

kyalun cami nya, cyu bling lmu’i na sali.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

kble lmu’i heya ga, waya kahun babaw lmu’i shotaw.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

yaba mu maras he kacing ru binro sbe nya mama mu.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。

cami mama mu mtisan myan cka sali, piyux ci yaw lela waya nya skayan.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他分享了很多故事。

gleng shri cu ga, strahu cu nya mama mu maha wa caku mbawi la ru waya cu mllaw hayi la.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

kmayan cu maha, “naga ble kakay na mama lga, babaw nya uwah tisan sali myan uyi.”
I said, When your foot gets better
我今天七點到學校。: come to our house next time and visit us.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34477/5: 我說：「等叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

maki te sa’ing seng pusan sa’ing kawas ga, sexu pklahang ku splawa naha lnhoyan na pkkayan yaw nku lalu mibunsyo tayan ga ana mosa sbiru lalu tayan nanak.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

nwahan mu mita Nolay Piho mlikuy na alang tayan, heya ga bsya calay mskura nya sexu pklahang ru msina sku mibunsyo ta ga aki nanak lalu tayan sbiru ta.
I interviewed Nolay Piho, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了的部落青年Nolay Piho，他長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」。

pkayan cami ’nyan hngawan ryax hani ga mosa cu mita sali nya.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

maki sku pkayan myan ga, sba’an cu nya kahun inu lalu nya, spkita cu nya utux sali nya ru alang nya uyi.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

kyalun mu heya maha ca utux ci lungan su mosa p’iyu lalu, ya’eh su pbiru na lela heya ga?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

kyalun cu nya maha, baha mcwa sbiru ta ke ckoku ga ini ba’i kmayan lalu nya, kruma c’oli ga No先生 san nya, piyux calay mhtu psya’an na ke.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \No Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34477/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫他「No先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

kmayan Nolay Piho maha, “sbiru ta ke Tayal lalu ta ga yaca ga calay ci lalu ta, lalu ta ga tgiwan na gluw ta Tayal, gluw utux sali, ru cnrxan ta, aki piyux hayi gluw tayan ga mosa naha llwan lalu naha nanak.”
Nolay Piho said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34477/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: Nolay Piho說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

cami uya ga mnwah myan tbayi rrami beh bbisan rami hesa, mnaras nya nanak nuhi nya rami mosa, kble myasa ni’un na nni’un tayan ru spkani nya kwara c’oli.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

kwara c’oli ga sli naha ci bbisan na uya, piyux calay c’oli bayi ali ruma ru cryuhing, piyux ci c’oli mwah tmalam mani tnahok nya nni’un.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and African eggplants, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，桂竹筍和山蘇很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

tnahok nya cryuhing ru sumun ga ble ci ni’un, kyan loyi tnahok nya m’aw tmagun syang biyak kahung, ble sokan nya ga tmapeh piyux ci llpyung, mwah m’otu bbisan myan kwara.
The Shansu and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的山蘇和糯米飯非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的馬告滷肉，味道吸引了很多客人，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

trang tmahok nni’un nku uya n_ga, maki cu beh syaw nya tmapeh llpyung. lokah cu smuy beh syaw nya maha, “rrami ga nuhi nanak, mrkyas nanak ungat iyu, nahay uwah bayi ow!”
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34477/5: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

kwara tbisun myan ga helaw ci waya su’un tbayi kwara, kmayan uya maha, “ulung isu mwah rmaw kwara.”
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

kahun ku lnhoyan hani ga, piyux ci waya mu kba’un nku knba’an na k’man tayan ru nni’un tayan, waya mu kba’un uyi ku kn’wix na tbayi bbisan.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

texan mu uya ga cmi ci lungan nni’un tayan, strahu mu calay ru p’asun maku.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
